# ğŸª² Beetle V2 â€“ Low Code UI Builder for Pega Constellation

Beetle is a visual, drag-and-drop, low-code app builder designed to generate custom React frontends for Pega Constellation applications. It helps designers and developers rapidly prototype UI flows and push configs to Pega DX APIs.

## ğŸš€ Features

- âœ¨ Modern UI built with Vite + React + TailwindCSS
- ğŸ§² Drag and drop components (powered by `@dnd-kit`)
- ğŸ¨ Right-side settings drawer for component configuration
- ğŸ“¤ Export canvas as JSON
- ğŸ“‚ Import saved layouts from JSON
- ğŸ—‘ Delete and reorder components
- ğŸ”œ Coming Soon: Push to Pega DX API, Preview mode, More UI elements
